attributes.action: for appling red passport and citizenship
attributes.additional_details: sir i beg to say  that i am pakistani  i was worker of royal air force in1968 at gan station po no#180 .and i left the job in 1976 due to nd of station. i applied for citizeship of UK during those days.but i could get it brcahse of spration of  pakistan from comonwealth.in reply of my pettion home office repplied me.they did not give me citizenship becauseof sepration of pakistan from commonwealth and now there own mindsetup eather they give me citizenship after 10 or 15 years latter.now pakistan is part of commonwealth so pleaze give me citizenship .i have all documents like driving license .id card etc

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be used for personal issues.
